message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you an exclusive opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. It's a unique and valuable item that I'm sure you'll find fascinating. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth to you, and I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.
I'm very interested in the product, but $1500000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $1200000 for it. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I can get from the product.

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, $1200000 is still a bit lower than I was hoping for. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $1400000. I think this is a fair price considering the value it can bring to you.

I'm still interested in the product, but $1400000 is a bit higher than I was hoping to pay. I'm willing to pay $1200000 for it, which is the maximum I'm willing to spend. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle again.
